entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is participating in the Triwizard Cup task.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Another participant in the Triwizard Cup task, who is paired with Harry.

entities.name: triwizard cup
entities.description: The object that Harry and Cedric are grasping handles of, which pulls them into a whirlwind.

relationships.description: Harry is being pulled by the Triwizard Cup, as he cannot unclench his hand from it.
Cedric is also being pulled by the Triwizard Cup, as he is at Harry's side.
